testcase.name: Create new message and Rule
testcase.system-out: I have logged in as "UserGroup" I navigate to "Marketing" tab I select "Repository Messages" from reports tab I create new message as "Test" with dates as "12/1/2018" and "6/13/2019" I select created new message "Test" edit selected message I navigate to Rules tab from Message Details window I add and verify new rule "NewRule" Click the insert tab to upload the file "FilePath" I select created new message "Test" Check the required check box and Approve the created message I select created new message "Test" Validate the approval status as "Pending Print Approval" select the Bin from drop down as "C" I navigate to Marketing Insert Approval tab edit and update the Insert id to Approve the Insert messsage "Test" I navigate to Marketing Repository messages tab I navigate to the Inserts tab I select created new message "Test" Validate the approval status as "Approved" Signout application
testcase.system-err:
Check the required check box and Approve the created message [[ATTACHMENT|results\screenshots\chrome.Create new message and Rule.png]]
Error: An attempt was made to operate on a modal dialog when one was not open. at alertText() - at C:\AutomationWDIO\WashingtonPost\node_modules\wdio-sync\build\index.js:316:3
